title: UFYB 166: Perfectionism & Achieving Impossible Goals
itunes:title: Perfectionism & Achieving Impossible Goals
description:
Are you a perfectionist who wants to do something big? Most of the tools life coaches use to help their clients go after big goals don’t take perfectionist thought patterns into account, which sets you up to fail before you’ve even started. Tune into today’s episode to learn how to work WITH your brain and blow your f*cking mind.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/166
content:encoded:
Are you a perfectionist who wants to do something big? Most of the tools life coaches use to help their clients go after big goals don’t take perfectionist thought patterns into account, which sets you up to fail before you’ve even started. itunes:subtitle: What an impossible goal is and how to set it in a way that serves you.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
